title: Laggs moment
body:
1 when chaging lane in draft
2 when writing in chat durei champ select (dunno in normal chat while not playing still not tried)
3 when is loading before game from client to champ review screen
4 sometimes when you pick champ in normal secret selection if u haven't selected yet you can't see other already locked champs

replies.body: 6 when you post in the wrong forum

5 when u change icon too it takes a while
but not only that
if u go in lobby it still show the old icon
